Name.label: Autosomal dominant mendelian susceptibility to mycobacterial diseases due to partial IFNgammaR1 deficiency
Autosomal dominant mendelian susceptibility to mycobacterial diseases due to a partial deficiency

TextSection.Contents: A rare, genetic variant of mendelian susceptibility to mycobacterial diseases (MSMD) characterized by a partial deficiency leading to impaired IFN-gamma immunity and, consequently, recurrent, moderately severe infections with bacillus Calmette-GuÃ©rin (BCG) and other environmental mycobacteria (EM).

Name.label: E (exact mapping (the terms and the concepts are equivalent))
